question: What is Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and why is it useful in this project?
reference_answer: RAG combines a retriever and a generator so the model can ground its answers in external documents instead of relying only on parameters. In this project it uses a local knowledge base to give grounded, explainable answers.

question: What is the goal of this agentic project in the Ciklum AI Academy context?
reference_answer: The goal is to build an agentic AI system that uses RAG, tools, and reflection to analyze its own repository and generate a professional social post as part of the Ciklum AI Academy.

question: How does the agent perform self-reflection on its answers?
reference_answer: After answering, the agent adds a Reflection sentence that comments on its confidence, possible improvements, or limitations.
